```{r}
str_c("Letter: ", letters)
str_c("Letter", letters, sep = ": ")
str_c(letters, " is for", "...")
str_c(letters[-26], " comes before ", letters[-1])

```

```{r}
str_c(letters,LETTERS)
str_c(letters,LETTERS,sep="-")
str_c("lowercase: ", letters, ", capital: ", LETTERS)
```
